verses.roman:
sei bhāve nija-vāñchā karila pūraṇa
avatārera ei vāñchā mūla-kāraṇa

synonyms: sei—that; bhāve—in the mood; nija-vāñchā—His own desires, karila—did; pūraṇa—fulfilling; avatārera—of the incarnation; ei—this; vāñchā—desire; mūla—root; kāraṇa—cause.
translation: In the mood of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī, He also fulfilled His own desires. This is the principal reason for His appearance.
